short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the rank of YouTube search results directly on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you interact with YouTube search results! The YouTube Search Rank Display Chrome extension adds valuable context to your search experience by showing the rank of each video or playlist directly within YouTube’s search results page. Here's what it does:

Features:
Rank Display

Displays the rank number for each video and playlist in your search results.
Excludes sponsored ads and Shorts from the ranking, ensuring a clean and accurate rank order.

Dynamic Updates

Ranks update automatically as you scroll, ensuring no interruptions to your browsing experience.
Resets the rank count when you perform a new search or reload the page.
Seamless Integration

Works entirely within YouTube’s search results interface without altering its core functionality or performance.
Why Use This Extension?
Discover Content Faster: Easily identify top results and navigate search rankings with clarity.
Ad-Free Ranking: Skip over sponsored content and focus on genuine search results.
Who is this for?
This extension is perfect for YouTube enthusiasts, marketers, and researchers who want deeper insights into their search results, free of distractions.

How to Use:
Install the extension.
Open YouTube and perform a search.
Watch as ranks appear next to search results, and a donation nudge is added before the first video!

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not track, store, or share any personal information. It only modifies the YouTube page layout locally within your browser
